name: Bubbleland
description:
You wouldn't believe how fast and rules-light a tactical turn-based game can be!

Bubbleland is a game in which the player leads a team of cartoon heroes through a series of tactical turn-based battles on a grid of hexes. The combat rewards smart positioning and using skills appropriate to the situation on the battlefield, but at the same time it’s more dynamic and less complicated than in similar titles.

Between battles, the party traverses a pastel, absurd world where plants, animals and even objects behave like humans and fight each other for precious Bubbles. On their way, the heroes may encounter characters who need their help, factions in conflict with each other, and allies who will help them in battles.

Tactical combat

The game is rules-light, you’re not going to find long statblocks and hour-long battles here. You may just hop in for a few fights any time!

Simple mechanics

Bubbleland is not crunchy, but you still have to think before you act. Cautious positioning of the heroes and planning your actions is crucial!

Engaging exploration

The treasures are waiting for you to discover them! The inhabitants of the land will help you if you let them. Look for interesting encounters in the wild... But be careful not to get lost!

Cartoonish setting

Graphics and sounds bring to mind animated series, intensifying the goofy and light-hearted atmosphere of the game. Music changes dynamically during battles, fueling emotions, and while exploring, it helps you immerse yourself in the colorful world.

Fun story

In the world deprived of the precious Bubbles, the heroes must go on an epic journey to salvation and self-discovery… Which is basically about beating up bad guys and getting more friends!

Colorful characters

Onion cossack bard, playing melancholically on his balalaika, huge cucumbers punching their enemies with themselves, vicious half-bees - half peanuts (extremely allergenic!) - the Bubblelands are full of amazing and ridiculous creatures.

This is a demo of the game
